amendment.description: Amendment establishes a national manufactured housing construction and safety standards consensus committee to develop Federal standards for the construction of manufactured homes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to amend the 1974 Housing and Community Development Act to require HUD to establish a federal manufactured housing construction and safety performance standards committee responsible for revising and interpreting federal standards governing the construction of manufactured housing. Under current law, HUD develops these standards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
